title: Junior Consultant - Software Developer
name: Name :
aboutMe: My name is Mathieu Alain - Mathieu is my first name by the way. I'm and I live in France near the Luxembourgian border. I'm currently working in a company named Alten in Luxembourg where I work on projects in Node.js, React Native and Angular for our clients. I like to spend my free time playing video games, enjoying a football game or drinking a beer with my friends. If you want to get more information about me, feel free to visit my LinkedIn profile or you can get my resume by clicking here.
projectsIntro: Here you can find some open-source projects I have been working on. I can't showcase most of them because they are proprietary. I try to work on open-source projects during my free time in order to learn and develop new skills. You can find their source code on my github.
saintHubertBody: Saint-Hubert is a web application based on PHP - Laravel to manage a hunting club. This app was created to answer the needs of a specific French hunting club and is only available in French for now.
websiteBody: This is my personal web site. The one you are visiting right now. It's made using Bootstrap and some custom CSS.
dbSaverBody: DB Saver is a small Python script that I developed to easily and simply backup my databases.
contactIntro: Feel free to contact me for any personal or business inquiries by email at alain.mathieu1996@gmail.com or by filling this form.
